item.description:
The New Year is almost upon us and the holiday season is underway. Even among all the temptations, festivity and yes—stress, that this time of year can deliver you don't need to wait until 2009 to embrace a healthy lifestyle.
Plus Size Yoga Meetup is a 75-90 minute yoga workshop is aimed at offering full figured women a judgment free space to embrace and support each other in a healthy lifestyle. It is more than a yoga class.

During the holidays we often put everyone else first. Take this time for yourself to slow down, be present and enjoy the company of others. It is your turn to recharge and refocus so that you can have the holiday season and life you want—starting here and now.

group.name: Plus Size Yoga Meetup for Women

item.name: Plus Size Yoga for Women (December Meetup)
